law.history: Repealed 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 82, sec. 2, effective June 25, 2013. -- Amended 2011 Ky. Acts ch. 2, sec. 15, effective June 8, 2011. -- Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 301, sec. 15, effective July 15, 1998.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Theft of a controlled substance -- Not considered theft under KRS Chapter 514.
